ohu siya kredit kad bhawithayedi masika kredit kadi wiyadamwala samanya itha ihala agayak wima, gewim sambandhayena inwoyis nothibima, aththikaram piyawima sandaha piligatha nohaki inwoyis idiripath kirima, nila wiyadam sandaha wiganana sakshi nothibima, paudgalika wiyadam piyawima sandaha pramada wima, singappuruwe darana lada paudgalika wiyadam nopiyawima, paudgalika wiyadam sandaha genena lada muddara gasthu nopiyawima, kredit kad patha sima ikmawima nisa gasthu gewima, adala nomathi wiyadam nila wiyadam lesa salakima, miladi ganime kriyamargayedi maha banku nithi ullanghanaya kirima, adhipathi nila niwasata itha aasanna wenath nawathanwala sitima, sthawara pragdhana nisi aakarawa ginum gatha nokirima saha bhauthikawa nothibima, paraspara wirodhi agayan wartha wima, mudal piyawima sandaha ekinekata wenas thorathuru sapayima, surabadu nithi rithi ullanghanaya kirima aadiya sidu kara athi bawa wiganana warthawe sandahan we.
